com.concordium.sdk.transactions

Interface Transaction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountTransaction, BlockItem, ConfigureBakerTransaction, ConfigureDelegationTransaction, CredentialDeploymentTransaction, DeployModuleTransaction, EncryptedTransferTransaction, EncryptedTransferWithMemoTransaction, InitContractTransaction, RawTransaction, RegisterDataTransaction, TransferScheduleTransaction, TransferScheduleWithMemoTransaction, TransferToEncryptedTransaction, TransferToPublicTransaction, TransferTransaction, TransferWithMemoTransaction, UpdateContractTransaction, UpdateCredentialKeysTransaction, UpdateInstructionTransaction

    public interface Transaction

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_NETWORK_ID 
      static int VERSION 
      static int VERSION_SIZE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      byte[] getBytes()
      Transaction serialized as bytes.
      default Hash getHash()
      Get the Hash of the Transaction
      default int getNetworkId()

      default byte[] getVersionedBytes()
      Returns serialized Transaction This is the raw bytes that is sent to the node.

    • Method Detail

      • getVersionedBytes

        default byte[] getVersionedBytes()
        Returns serialized Transaction This is the raw bytes that is sent to the node. It is a concatenation of the Transaction Version VERSION + getBytes()
        Returns:
        The serialized Transaction

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes()
        Transaction serialized as bytes. How a transaction is serialized to bytes depends on type of the transaction. See BlockItemType.

        These bytes are not sent directly to the node. For that getVersionedBytes() is used.

        Returns:
        Serialized bytes of this Transaction.

      • getHash

        default Hash getHash()
        Get the Hash of the Transaction
        Returns:
        the hash

      • getNetworkId

        default int getNetworkId()
        The network id. The default value is DEFAULT_NETWORK_ID
        Returns:
        the network id.
